page.title: 07Glove Factory. Kingsbury.
page.content: First we saw a man cutting material with a hand shaped knife.There was another knife shaped like a thumb.When the man had cut some glove shapes he put them into packages of dozens for the ladies to make them into gloves.We saw some ladies making gloves.They were fixing cuffs,sewing them up and ironing the gloves.To iron a glove they put it on a hot metal hand for a few seconds,then take it off and press it under a heavy metal block.All the gloves have to be examined.If somebody has not sewn a glove up properly the lady will put a pin where it is not sewn up and she will give it to someone to put right.Some ladies packed the gloves into bags.At the end we saw a man packing the finished gloves into a big box.
